medium: Chromium-plated steel and enameled metal with rubber fittings
title: "Soda King" syphon bottle
text: With this soda water dispenser, a must-have for cocktail mixing, Bel Geddes' name appears alongside the manufacturer's on the bottom, a testament to the recognition given to industrial designers in the early years of their profession.
creditline: The Modernism Collection, gift of Norwest Bank Minnesota
